attributes.action: Abolish the Human Rights Act Immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Human Rights Act is used to assist criminals to escape punishment and enrich Human Rights Lawyers, at the expense of the majority of law abiding, tax paying public. 
Abolish it now and give us back the rights we had before this stifling EU Law came into being.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish the Human Rights Act Immediately."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11949.asp

Prime Minister's Office
